extension.name: EDocman search
extension.author: Ossolution Team
extension.description: This module allows users to search for EDocman documents

field.name: layout_type
field.label: Search Result Layout
field.description: Choose the layout you want to use to display search result

field.name: input_style
field.label: Input stylesheet
field.description: Please select input style in Search form

field.name: show_category
field.label: Show Category
field.description: Do you want to show Category of Documents in Search result

field.name: default_category_id
field.label: Default category ID
field.description: You can enter the default Category ID number, in that case, the dropdown select list Category will not show in Search module. You can find the Category ID in Categories management page

field.name: file_type
field.label: Search through file extensions
field.description: Please enter file extensions that you want to search through, separated by comma. For example: pdf,doc,docx
